isis.stitle: DIAMONDLIFE™ (BOSCH PIN SLIDE) DISC BRAKES For Vehicles Built Before June 3, 2002 - DESCRIPTION - CALIPER

svcproc.title: CALIPER
svcproc.para:
Refer to Figure 4
for Items in parentheses.

The caliper (Item 1) is a single piece casting which contains an internal fluid passageway between the two hydraulic piston bores (Item 2). The piston bores contain the two pistons, piston boots (Items 3 and 4) and piston seals which are not visible.
There are two different sizes of the pin slide disc brake assemblies: 66 mm and 73 mm. These calipers can be used in the following combinations based on specific vehicle applications:
The specific caliper combinations depends on the load rating for the vehicle.

important.para: NEVER change the caliper size in the field from what was original equipment on the vehicle.
